Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Smith, your son. So the next Smith has already been picked?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'John', 3: 'Have you heard the story about the hero, Nikola?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "Didn't know you had a taste for that kind of story.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'John', 3: 'It was a story I heard from the last Smith, back when I was becoming a "real Smith". He told me it was only natural for the hero to challenge the demon king.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'John', 3: 'The hero had to go and defeat the demon king. That was his duty.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'John', 3: 'He started training since childhood and, at the youngest possible age, embarked on a crusade against the demon king.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'John', 3: "His life was dictated by fate and by other people. His own will didn't matter.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'John', 3: 'And finally when he came face to face with the demon king, the latter asked: "Will you take my life, or half of the world?"', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'John', 3: "What, do you think, was the hero's answer?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "Kill the demon king, of course... No, it wouldn't be that simple...", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'John', 3: 'Exactly. His answer was "half of the world". Only those who have made tough decisions in life can appreciate the ingenuity of that answer. That said, I don\'t want the next Smith to be a hero.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'John', 3: 'Pick up all the pieces and piece them together.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'John', 3: 'And then "Smith" will become the perfect monster.', 4: '2'}
